title: Captive Ride
description: Flint, the Death Lords VP, has been watching sexy, buttoned-up attorney Amelia Voll ever since she agreed to defend a club’s member on a murder charge. Watching and waiting until she pokes her head out from underneath her mountain of files and realizes there’s an entire life outside the courtroom...and he's the man to help her discover it. But when Amelia steps out with another man, it’s time for Flint to step in and take her for a Captive Ride.
author: Ella Goode
